title: EIM21600 - The benefits code:particular benefits and expenses payments: general

details.body:
The main charging rules relating to benefits and expenses
payments of directors and employees, except those in an excluded
employment (see
[EIM20007](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM20007.htm)), are dealt with in
[EIM20001](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM20001.htm) onwards.

The links below show:

*   how the rules apply to particular benefits
and
*   which benefits and expenses payments are
exempt from tax.

The benefits and exemptions are listed alphabetically as
detailed below.

sections.title:
Benefits and exemptions
from A to B

Benefits and exemptions
from C to H

Benefits and exemptions
from I to P

Benefits and exemptions
from R to Z
